title: your top 3 champs are in your house

replies.body:
Well, for starters, {{champion:103}} won't get off the fucking couch, even though I've told her like nine times. She knows she's not allowed up there.

{{champion:268}} won't stay out of the damn bird feeder. I've tried putting one of those fake owls out to keep him away from it, but I keep finding them with spear holes and sand under the porch.

And if that wasn't bad enough {{champion:254}} has been making me go to the gym with her to spar and I'm like 80% sure that I have a broken rib and a punctured lung.

> [{quoted}](name=Scareon41,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=wNeEe9vi,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-09-03T16:30:00.683+0000)
>
> Well, for starters, {{champion:103}} won't get off the fucking couch, even though I've told her like nine times. She knows she's not allowed up there.
> 
> {{champion:268}} won't stay out of the damn bird feeder. I've tried putting one of those fake owls out to keep him away from it, but I keep finding them with spear holes and sand under the porch.
> 
> And if that wasn't bad enough {{champion:254}} has been making me go to the gym with her to spar and I'm like 80% sure that I have a broken rib and a punctured lung.

That's Vi's way of showing affection... I think she likes you.
My only fear would be that Vi is a top... my body is _not_ ready for that...

{{champion:102}} tries doing her own thing while {{champion:62}} tries to play pranks on her, making her angry. {{champion:82}} meanwhile is scheaming how to get Shyvana on his side so he may take her soul as his weapon.

{{champion:37}} She's just off playin her music while FUCKING

{{champion:113}}  AND {{champion:22}}  **WONT STOP FIGHTING**

~~get me out of here!!~~

{{champion:122}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:202}} 

seeing Sona playing a piece made jhin starting a monologue on art4 , which made darius falling asleep.

{{champion:31}}  {{champion:98}}  {{champion:75}} 

Cho'gath eats shen, nasus and me. The end.

> [{quoted}](name=PartyPanda12,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=wNeEe9vi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-03T16:24:17.188+0000)
>
> {{champion:31}}  {{champion:98}}  {{champion:75}} 
> 
> Cho'gath eats shen, nasus and me. The end.

 NOM NOMNOMNOM

*sitting outside the wreckage of my house with {{champion:62}} and {{champion:150}} looking very guilty*

{{champion:44}}: Hey, I'm back from getting grocer- WTF HAPPENED HERE?!

 http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b430/bluemoonwolf8/BlueMoonWolf_small_zpsnsjj9kxv.png : ...Wukong though it would be funny to see what would happen if he were too hide Gnars snacks. Gnar eventually lost his temper and... well, you can fill in the rest -__-

{{champion:44}}: Wukong didn't try to stop him?

 http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b430/bluemoonwolf8/BlueMoonWolf_small_zpsnsjj9kxv.png : Actualy, he qickly rushed to fight him. Not to stop him mind you, just to test his abilities ... he's the reason there is no kitchen anymore...

{{champion:44}}: *sigh* I'll call up Garen again and see if he can loan me more money... But I'll want something in return ;3

 http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b430/bluemoonwolf8/BlueMoonWolf_small_zpsnsjj9kxv.png o_o
As a support main, i wouldn't mind. 8)
{{champion:21}} Having an argument with {{champion:245}} because he likes melee over ranged. While {{champion:37}} is playing her pentakill music to show how badass she is.
I pretty much live in a closet, So I guess Demon vi, Sion and  Cho'gath are the monsters to be found in a closet.
Morgana, Sona, and Shyvanna.... I cant even imagine...
Morgana and Shyvana hate each other and Sona is there to make sure the house doesn't get destroyed

{{champion:222}} would literally just blow the entire place up while {{champion:21}} chases her around and tries to put a stop to it, but that ain't gonna happen because girl, you're not catching Jinx. {{champion:267}} tries to do damage control as well but the poor girl just splashes water everywhere.
Anivia flew in, my pipes froze and burst. amumus tears ate into the ground to my septic, brand ignited all the H2S in the tank when he sneezed. I am homeless now.

Darius Yasuo and fiora I honestly don't know what would happen. I mean free ac with yas. I will get really good at basketball. And fiora I mean headmistress ^.^ never fail a class (what did you think)
